title: Mode not supported
body: i have the same resolution as my desktop but it keeps saying mode not supported unless i play on borderless

replies.body: There was an issue about two weeks ago where some players were receiving this error while in full screen, and pressing alt+enter served as a workaround.  The issue should be resolved now, so we'd like to take a look with you individually to see why it's persisting for you.   Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
